posts.post_title: 102 T206 for sale including Cobb and Johnson SOLD
posts.post_content: Posted By: robert a I'm offering 102 T206 for sale in one lot. All cards are guaranteed authentic and unaltered. A few have punch holes and one card (Murphy)is trimmed but presents very well. Price is lowered to $Sold The lot includes 16 Hofers with: Cobb Red Johnson Portrait Joss x 3 Bender x 2 Beckley x 2 Griffith McGraw Huggins Jimmy Collins Chance batting Chance yellow Jennings A few southern leaguers and a few el principe, old mill, polar bear backs. All Scans can be viewed here in the first two albums: [URL="http://imageevent.com/caramelcard"][URL="http://imageevent.com/caramelcard>"]http://imageevent.com/caramelcard
